Project 3: JSON Configuration Manager Difficulty: 1/10 | Duration:
1-2 days | Tech: JSON, Python
What You Build: A tool that reads JSON configuration files, updates specific
values, validates structure, and saves changes back.
Exact Steps: 1. Load JSON config file (settings for ML model, API keys,
etc.) 2. Display current configuration 3. Update specific values (database URL,
batch size, etc.) 4. Validate JSON structure is still valid 5. Save updated config
back to file 6. Show config before/after changes
Learning Goals: - Working with JSON format - Python data structures (dicts)
- File operations with JSON - Data validation basics
Real-World Use: Application configuration management, ML model hyper-
parameters, API settings
